job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Description Remote Data scientists use data and analytical ability to find and interpret rich data sources; manage large amounts of data despite hardware, software, and bandwidth constraints; merge data sources; ensure consistency of data sets; create visualizations to aid in understanding data; build mathematical models using the data; and present and communicate the data insights/findings. Requirements Seeking candidates with a strong machine learning and or econometric background, some knowledge of optimization Ideal candidate will have more than 2 years of experience with one of R or Python Must have post-grad in a numerate discipline and worked for a minimum of 4 years
